Hero.description: TheNextStartup is an open-source template designed with scalability in mind, providing a swift pathway to launch your startup. It ensures high engineering quality while being cost-effective, making it an ideal choice for aspiring entrepreneurs.

Benefits.Benefits1_description: Register your app domain name, bulletproof it from intruders, analyze its web traffic and more using Cloudflare services.
Benefits.Benefits2_description: Coolify lets you decide where to deploy your application, easy and cost-effective with no vendor lock-ins.
Benefits.Benefits3_description: With NextJS and our tools, Auth, Front-end, Back-end, Components, and Type-safety come seamlessly integrated.
Benefits.Benefits4_description: As startups grow, managing multiple apps and tasks becomes complex. An NX monorepo simplifies this with shared libraries and dependencies in a single repository.
Benefits.Benefits5_description: Enjoy effortless global replication and lightning-fast transactions with Turso. Say goodbye to migration hassles with Drizzle ORM.
Benefits.Benefits6_description: Language internationalization and payment integration with Stripe is included, with more features on the way. Check the documentation for details. Thank you!
